transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, haan ji sir, ab clear hai meri aawaz? 
Customer: Ji ji ab clear hai.
Executive: Ji. So main ye aapse baat karna chah rahi thi, main zyada samay aapka nahi lungi, lekin main jaanti hu aap busy rehte hain. But ek cheez na thoda conclusion pe pahunchna zaruri hai sir, humne jo discussion kiya tha service ko leke. 
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap bata rahe the ki aapke papa ji aapke saath mein baat hui. Ji ji.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm. Kya keh rahe hain pitaji aapke? 
Customer: Wo wo ye keh rahe hain ki bhai abhi nahi koi zarurat nahi hai bas.
Executive: Achha ek cheez mujhe bataiye thoda, main maanti hu is cheez ko, ek baat mujhe bataiye jaise business vagera sara aap hi dekhte hain, marketing, sales sari cheeze aap hi dekhte hain mostly cheeze, production vagera bhi aap hi dekhte hain. 
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To mujhe lagta hai ki is cheez ko lekar mein jo main decision hota hoga shayad aapka hota hoga. Baaki aapne bataya ki father hain to unke saath bhi discussion important hai, wo main agree karti hu. 
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi mam, sab kuch bhale hi chahe mere haath mein hai par rahega unke hi haath mein wo.
Executive: Nahi cheeze samajhna aur phir discuss karna wo cheez to kar sakte hain na sir? 
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Achha ek cheez mujhe bataiye, sir ko aapke father ko is service mein, maximizer service mein problem kahan lagi hai? Price ko lekar ya service mein? 
Customer: Mam unhe problem nahi nahi mam unhe problem pehle IndiaMART mein lagi thi, wo to pehle bhi nahi dila rahe the maine zabardasti liya tha wo bhi.
Executive: Aur ye to phir matlab problem jo lagi unhe wo to phir sari cheeze resolve ho gayi na phir to kyunki aap IndiaMART se samajh nahi. 
Customer: Mam actually mein problem ye hai mam wo ek purane aadmi ki baat hoti hai na.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Unka jo way of thinking hota hai ki bhai online mein pata nahi kya hoga, ye hoga, wo hoga, unke saath wo wala mamla hai.
Customer: Ab jo aapne baat batai mujhe maximizer ki wo meri samajh mein aa rahi hai. Theek hai na? Par father ki samajh mein wo nahi aayegi. Nahi nahi mam mujhe to mere sare ghar mein har aadmi educated hai aur bahut achha educated hai. Theek hai main nahi hu main kam kam main thoda kam educated hu. But main aapko sach bata raha hu mujhe sab pata hai. Matlab mera chota bhai jo hai wo wo har waqt online mein baith har waqt online mein rehta hai. Theek hai? Sab kuch hai par wo mujhe samajh mein aa gaya par wo father ko isliye nahi samajh mein aa raha ki nahi bhai koi zarurat nahi hai kya fayda ek lakh invest karne ka teen saal ke liye kya pata kya ho ye wo. Achha bhai theek hai bas.
Executive: To to phir teen saal nahi to kya do saal ka plan kar lo na. Kyun nahi ek saal mein aap. 
Customer: Mam maine to maine to pehle hi nahi nahi. Maine to pehle hi unhe ek saal bataya tha mam. Haan. Maine pehle hi unhe ek saal bataya tha maine do saal ka plan agar bhi main leta bhi to main unhe yahi kehta ki ek saal ka hai.
Executive: Achha achha achha. Ji. Maine unhe pehle hi wo ek saal ka kaha hai. Main ek cheez keh rahi hu aap hain aur aapki family mein aapke bhai hain baaki sab log hain sab educated hain well educated sari cheeze jaante hain. In fact aapne experience bhi kiya IndiaMART ke saath jud ke. 
Customer: Mam main aapko batau dekhiye main aapko batata hu. Mile. Hmm.
Customer: Nahi main aapko batata hu. Sab kuch kaam mere haath mein hai A to Z har cheez main dekhta hu. Apni firm ka sab kuch mere haath mein hai. But ek wo jo hota hai na ki mujhe jo kaam karna hai na wo father se puche bagair kar hi nahi sakta. Wo wo wala mamla hai bas.
Executive: Main maanti hu sir, ye cheez to hoti hi hai aur honi chahiye bhi, ye hai bhi theek. Lekin main ek cheez bas ye kehna chah rahi hu ki dekho aapki company aur aapka jo nature of business hai na, jo dealing of nature of dealing hai ye sab cheeze jo hain accurate uske liye jo aapke liye right place hona chahiye na sir, main sirf aapko wo cheez bata rahi hu. Aap IndiaMART pe trust karke jude TrustSeal service mein, theek hai? Aur aapne kuch mahino business kiya aapko results bhi mile, orders bhi mile sari cheeze achhi hain. Aap aage karoge, theek hai bhagwan ki kripa se aapko aage bhi kaam milega sir. Lekin na baat ye hai ki jitni mehnat aap TrustSeal service mein lagaoge halanki abhi ek do mahine baad jaise hi aapki production shuru hogi aap phir shuru kar doge use karna. To jitni mehnat aap TrustSeal service mein lagaoge utni se aadhi mehnat agar aapne maximizer service mein laga di to jitne order aap TrustSeal mein karte hain usse kai guna zyada order aapko maximizer mein milte rahenge. Pehla scenario to ye hai. Dusri baat. 
Customer: Ji. Haan. Main bas ek cheez apni line complete karna chah rahi thi.
Executive: Nahi ji ji kar dijiye koi nahi.
Executive: Dusri baat main ye kehna chah rahi hu ki order lena aur na lena wo totally aapke haath mein hai. Aapki call hai aap jitne order observe kar sakte ho utne karo, jitne nahi kar sakte clear us cheez pe wahan pe rok laga sakte hain. Lekin jo maximizer service ka fayda aapko milega na wo sirf order ke taur par hi nahi hai wo usme visibility bahut important role play karti hai. Aapka domain bahut important role play karta hai. Dekho aap aap bhai vagera bhi aapke sab jaante hi hain sir aap bhi jaante ho ki domain ka aaj ke time pe kya mahatva hai. Agar kal ko aap IndiaMART chhod dete ho TrustSeal service mein reh kar, theek hai? To IndiaMART se nikalne ke baad dekho kisi aur platform platform pe agar aapki marketing hai, visibility hai to main keh nahi sakti lekin agar sirf IndiaMART pe hi promote karte hain aap khud ko to phir IndiaMART se nikalte hi aapka jo visibility hai wo sab zero ho jana hai. Jo bhi availability hai wo sab khatam ho jaani hai. To online market mein presence hi khatam ho jayegi sir. Lekin domain ka kya scenario rahega maan lo ek saal aapne domain liya aur uske baad ek saal ke baad aapne socha nahi theek hai ab IndiaMART se kaam nahi karna maan lo example ke liye, theek hai? To kya hoga ki jo bhi domain aapka hum bana ke denge uska promotion rukta nahi hai sir. Wo kabhi expire nahi hota wo kabhi gayab nahi hota wo promote hota hi rehta hai domain aapka. Dusri cheez uske jo ID password credentials hote hain wo hum aapko wapas kar denge. Aap uska phir promotion kahin se bhi karaiye aap uska renewal kahin se bhi karaiye wo aapki choice hai. Hum aapko baandh ke nahi rakhenge aur na hi aapki un cheezon ko kharab karenge. Visibility aapki chalti rehti hai. IndiaMART ka jo search engine optimization hai na SEO hai wo bahut strong hai sir. To isme jo aapka promotion hota hai na main dekho ye cheez committed nahi hai matlab hum na commit nahi karte hain bolte nahi hain saamne se lekin hota hai. Kehte hain na kuch cheeze boli nahi jaati lekin ho jaati hain by default. To aapka jo promotion hai aapka jo domain hai wo Google pe bhi nazar aata hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji, theek hai. Ab mam problem. 
Executive: Theek hai hum karte nahi hain haan haan boliye sir. 
Customer: Ab ab mere saath problem filhaal ye hai dekhiye main filhaal to father ko chhed nahi sakta uski wajah to iski kuch hum business mein bhi is time uljhe rahe hain bahut zyada theek hai na? Haan. Ye ye to ho sakta hai ki kuch time baad matlab mahine ek baad ki main thoda sa jab mujhe main thoda relax ho jaunga sab kuch hamara ho jayega uske baad main phir tasalli se baith ke samjhaun unhe kyunki maine abhi samjhane ki bahut koshish kari but unke dimag mein ye hai ki ek lakh ek bahut bada amount hai. Theek hai? Aur ek saal ek bahut. Ji? 
Executive: Aap ek lakh pe mat jao na phir. Agar sir ko ek lakh bahut bada main wahi cheez puchh rahi thi na aapse starting mein. 
Customer: Mam mujhe ek baat to bataiye aap nahi suniye. Maximizer do saal ka ek lakh kuch ka hai.
Executive: Achha. Main maine jo hota hai pro rata base pe ruk jaaiye main aapko bata ke de du kya hai. Theek hai.
Executive: Sir do saal ka jo hai na wo hai 82939 ka. Abhi thoda sa matlab do teen hazaar rupaye ka farak aa gaya hoga to 85 maan lo. Theek hai abhi ya to agar aap kehte ho to main deal abhi bana ke batati hu kyunki isme na har din ke hisab se aapka paisa minus ho raha hai sir. Jo hum aapka TrustSeal service ka jo paisa abhi aapka diya hua hai aapne jo chal raha hai service usme se isme pro rata base pe adjustment hoga. Jitne zyada din aap isme TrustSeal service mein nikal doge chalate jaoge utna zyada jo amount adjust ho raha hai na wo kam hota chala jayega.
Customer: Chaliye ab ab aap aap meri thodi si wo samajhiye matlab agar main abhi ekdam abhi end PC hai hind dena wo karta hu to mere liye thodi si problem hai ki main mujhe kyunki dekho mujhe father se bhi consult karna padega theek hai? Main apne thoda chhote bhai ko bhi chhote bhai ko banaunga ki bhai keh de tu ki bhai kara do inhe. Theek hai na? Wo cheez kyunki mujhe apna pura base leke chalna padega from starting jaise maine IndiaMART ke liye kara tha.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai na? To usme mujhe thoda sa time chahiye rahega. Ab mere liye aisa nahi hai ki ki agar single main person hu haan bhai mujhe khud sab kuch karna hai to main kar lunga theek hai bhai koi baat nahi bhai jab iska le liya to ye bhi sahi. Hmm hmm. But mere saath jo father ka mamla hai na ab unka jo way of thinking hai na wo hai ki bhai thoda kaam kar lo sukoon ka kaam kar lo. 
Executive: Haan haan samajh rahi hu. Theek hai na? Bas wo wala mamla hai. Hmm hmm. Baat thodi si ye aa rahi hai na ki sir thoda shayad mujhe lagta hai ki online vagera ke mamle mein itna zyada jaante nahi honge to thoda na ek dar rehta hai sir man mein ki paisa agar itna starting mein laga bhi de aur aage chal ke kuch upar neeche koi baat hui to kaun responsible karega. Hmm. Main maanti hu us cheez ko. Bas lekin thoda sa samjhane ki aavashyakta hai aap tarike se batayenge aur phir aap log to sir sabhi log online mein itna invested hain aapke brother vagera bhi to aur IndiaMART mein aapka result saamne aaya unko ye cheez dikhayenge batayenge to ye doubt kam ho sakta hai aur IndiaMART koi aisi sir aaj kal ki mithai vithai company nahi hai 29 saalon se IndiaMART market mein hai B2B platform hai. 
Customer: Wo wo wo cheez ki to baat hi nahi ho rahi. Matlab mere father ko bhi pata hai ki no doubt IndiaMART se hamara bahut achha kaam nikla hai. Ji. But ek cheez hoti hai na ki unhe baith ke tasalli se samjhana jab insan mind fresh ho jab uska bilkul uske baad use topic pe laya jaaye ki bhai aise aise isme ye cheez hogi humen ye cheez ka fayda hoga ye cheez hai. Usme thoda time ye cheeze thoda time leti hai hand to hand nahi ho paayengi. 
Executive: Theek hai to aapko kitna time chahiye? Mere se to kabhi bhi nahi ho paayegi. Mam kam se kam maan ke chaliye kam se kam November to bhool hi jaaiye aap kyunki November to mam is time pe main aapko sach baat batau na mujhe mere khane ki pata na mujhe mere peene ki pata main to har waqt factory mein hi hu. 
Executive: Subah shaam mein raat mein to milte honge na sir kyunki dekho abhi November nikal jayega na to. 
Customer: Problem ye ho rahi hai. Suniye. Main ab apni factory mein khada hu. Haan. Father office mein hai. Ab mujhe pata nahi main office kab jaunga. Mujhe khud nahi pata main apne hi office mein kab jaunga. Koi ekdam hatho hath kaam aa gaya ki ekdam jana pad gaya wo ek alag mamla hai par mujhe kyunki mam zyadatar mera jo wo hai wo mera maal loading ka wo hai. Mujhe sab apne hand se loading karana padta hai sab kuch. Jitna sab maal load hoga jitna sab likha jayega jitni sab billing hogi ye sab kuch mujhe apne hi hand pe karna padta hai. Hmm hmm. Ye problem hai. Main karta hu chaliye befikar rahiye aap main dekhta hu. Ji ji jaldi hota hai. 
Executive: Dekhiye dekhiye baat thodi si ye aa jaati hai karne ko to hum kabhi bhi kar sakte hain lekin na jo offer mil rahe hote hain na sir uska na dekho aapko bhi pata hai ki offer hamesha ek validity ke saath aate hain sir. Itne time mein expire hai hai na? Koi bhi offer hai kahin pe bhi lagta hai validity ke saath aata hai to wo jo offer aur abhi kya hai ki lagbhag lagbhag aapka do saal ke andar takriban aapka 20 10 se 20 hazaar ka fayda ho raha tha kyunki iska flat discount lag raha hai aur alag se hamari jo service ka amount adjust ho raha hai wo to fayda mil hi raha hai saath mein mere paas abhi bhi opportunity hai ki main ispe kuch online jaise online modes vagera payment karte hain to uspe bhi mere paas abhi kuch discount chal raha hai to thoda bahut discount main aapko wahan pe bhi dila sakti hu. To prices mein aapko bahut achhe benefits dila sakti hu aap ek lakh ki baat kar rahe hain ye bahut kam baith jayega amount. Theek hai to. 
Customer: Chaliye mam karta hu phir father se baat jaldi se jaldi koshish karta hu ki wo samajh jaaye is baat ko zyada behtar rahega mere liye. Aap. Kyunki mam mera mera mera jo wo hai na mera sirf samjhana hai iske alawa main kuch nahi kar sakta. Agar possibility hai to kya aap baat kara sakte hain un sir se aapke pitaji se baat kara sakte hain? 
Customer: Main factory mein hi hu. Nahi nahi main jab bhi aap pahuncho unke paas to unhe samjhane ke liye plan ke liye kuch cheeze unhe samjhane ke liye plan ke liye kuch cheeze. Haan haan haan for sure. Main aapki baat main Sandeep bhai ko bolta hu main Sandeep bhai ko bolta hu wo hi aage baat kar lenge wo zyada behtar rahega. Achha achha. Ji. Theek hai dekho agar Sandeep sir se baat karana chahe face to face baith ke milwakar theek hai to unse bhi kar sakte hain. Baaki kai baar hota hai sir jaise bhi hai chalo theek hai aapka bond bhi unke saath theek hai it's okay but ek ek baar ye bhi cheeze hoti hai na sir ki kaafi kuch cheeze na head office mein baithte hain main main seedha aapse head office se baat kar rahi hu. Ji ji ji mujhe malum hai. Haan Noida one sector sector 135 mein hamara head office hai main yahin se baat kar rahi hu aapka head head office se hi take care hota hai. To yahan hum logon ke paas jo offers hote hain unse extra discounts vagera mil sakte hain na wo hamari marketing team de nahi paati hai. To jo benefits hain aur bahut si cheeze aisi hain jo bahut behtar tarike se hum shayad explain kar sakte hain halanki sir bhi achhe hain aur wo sab cheeze jaante hain aapka unse purana touch hai to bilkul baat karo koi issue nahi hai lekin kuch aisi cheeze hoti hain jo hum batana chahte hain sir aapko apni taraf se kuch extra hum kara ke de sakte hain as being your account manager to ek baar aap mera discussion zarur karana. Chaliye theek theek theek hai mam for sure. To last to last sir aap next month sorry next Monday se pehle ya Monday tak ka decide kar sakte hain 24 hai sir next month mein. Chaliye mam main dekhta hu. Hai na abhi iske do teen din is wale week mein bhi hain aapke paas to koshish kijiye sir aaj ya kal mein jaisa bhi possible hota hai ek baar baat kariye aur phir mere ek baar baat kara dijiye jaisa bhi rehta hai achhe discounts ke saath main ise close karwati hu aapki deal ko. Okay okay. Chaliye theek hai sir. Thank you. Ab ab kabhi na busy hua kare sir to jaise main WhatsApp pe aapko message dal deti hu to please us pe reply kar diya karo. Ha mam mil jayegi kya sun rahi hu. Okay okay okay. Theek hai sir okay thank you. Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's father is hesitant about the service.

- Father thinks 1 lakh is a big amount.

- Customer is busy with factory work.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of maximizer service.

- Executive offered to connect with head office.

- Executive offered to create a deal.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will talk to his father.

- Customer will connect with the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- maximizer, trustseal, domain, subscription, discount
